meanings.definition: An animal found wandering at large or lost.
meanings.sent1: The farmer found an estray cow in his field.
meanings.sent2: The shelter took in an estray dog found on the street.
meanings.sent3: The estray goat seemed to be enjoying its solo adventure.
meanings.sent4: The estray horse symbolized freedom to the young girl.
meanings.sent5: The estray cat's meows echoed through the empty alleyway.
